bio.en:
Contact : heiko.mueller[AT]sciences-po.fr

Heiko Müller studied Communication in Social and Economic Contexts with a focus on qualitative and quantitative research methods, competitive strategy and culture at the Berlin University of the Arts. He has more than 10 years of experience as Managing Director and strategy consultant.  Before he came to Sciences Po in the beginning of 2012, he initiated the research activities of a consulting agency based in Berlin and worked in research projects for organizations such as Axel Springer, studiVZ and Fox Mobile. In his former years, Heiko Müller launched a new product category in the field of optical recording media in close collaboration with European industrial partners.

role.en: Spécialiste d’étude d’organisation et de stratégie
